basics.label: Business Development Professional
basics.summary: Seeking meaningful, part to full-time employment with an organization that could benefit from my professional experience with business development, management, and training business support.

work.name: Business Development Company Name
work.summary: Developed start up budget of $500,000 for new business. Created and maintained strong regular clientele. Lead in running operations and financial management of business. Implemented employee incentive programs. Developed cost controls. Created marketing materials to grow business. Lead management team.

work.name: Business Management Company Name
work.summary: Lead management team. Developed guest loyalty programs. Developed guest satisfaction procedures. Developed and implemented policy and procedure manuals. Corporate Trainer Lead in training, motivating, and coaching of over 1000 staff members. Retail Product Development
